thread.section_title: sellbackyourBook.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of sellbackyourBook.com | sellbackyourbook.com | 30 of 337
thread.title: Heather

author: Heather
title: Heather
text: They gave me the best price i could find and I received a check within a reasonable amount of time. The only complaint I have is that it took 2 weeks for them to receive my book and I felt as if they blamed me, when all they had to do was check the shipping confirmation number to check the progress and find out I shipped the book within a day of making the order.
